text:
Wrote something for this ticket: <https://uncorkedstudios.atlassian.net/browse/LCG-11>
I pushed it on ```different_locale_wallpaper_download```
I set the Calendar in getMillisUntilMidnight to Pacific Time, since the times in Berlin and Eastern Time are the same time (except I think daylight savings time happens a different week in Europe, so that might get weird). I tried out creating separate methods for each case, but it seemed messy when theyâ€™re generally happening at the same time.
That code computes midnight in the local timezone

To have the wallpaper change at different times in Berlin & EST.
Now, I'm guessing that I misjudged what it's doing...
Isn't that where the time for the wallpaper change is being set? Via setAlarm?
Yeah but it calculates milliseconds to midnight for the phones current time
